retrieved_content.content:
```html

Sports, Recreation & Leisure

Sports, Recreation & Leisure

To add or update your organization’s details, please email the Parish Clerk.

Please note that whilst care has been taken to ensure accuracy of the information relating to the organisations below which has been accepted and provided in good faith, the Parish Council cannot be held responsible for errors or omissions. Inclusion of an organisation's details does not constitute endorsement or support by the Council.

Clubs and Societies

Open All
Click To View Information on Active for Life Programme: New Forest Walks

Two walks per month with different volunteer leaders

  • 01590 623764
Click To View Information on Allotments Association

Contact Victoria Jago - 01590 622995

Click To View Information on Ladies' Badminton

For women with a reasonable playing standard. Meets at Village Hall on Thursdays from 9.30am to 11am

  • Contact Marion Wicks - 01590 624012
Click To View Information on Senior Citizens' Badminton

Friendly play for the 'not so young' most Fridays from September to April in Brockenhurst College Sports Hall from 4.30pm to 6pm

  • Contact Keith Nolan - 01590 622275
Click To View Information on Badminton Coaching for Juniors

Open to 10 - 16 year olds. WPC Satellite Club meets at Brockenhurst College Sports Hall on Mondays in school term time from 6pm to 7.30pm

  • Contact Rob Cook - 01590 625536
Click To View Information on Bell Ringers

Practice at St Nicholas' Church on Tuesdays at 6pm

  • Contact Julie Hodkin - 01590 622849
Click To View Information on Brockenhurst Bowling Club

Entrance to club via gate at end of Brookley Road Car Park. Pleasant clubhouse and bar. Playing April to end of September from 10am to 9.30pm. New bowlers welcome. Coaching facilities available. Ladies' and gents' sections. Discounted annual subscriptions for new members.

  • Contact Derek Place - 01425 473855
Click To View Information on Brockenhurst Choir

Mixed choir of over 80 voices. Rehearsals at Village Hall on Tuesdays at 7.45pm. New members welcome

  • www.brockenhurstchoir.com
Click To View Information on Brockenhurst Cricket Club

Brockenhurst Cricket Ground (in front of Balmer Lawn Hotel). First XI play Hampshire & New Forest League matches on Saturdays. Competitive social matches held on Sundays and midweek in Summer and 6-a-side indoor league matches in Winter

  • 07876 550517
  • info@brockenhurst.co.uk

Museums, Libraries, Art Galleries & Theatres

Open All
Click To View Information on Christopher Tower New Forest Reference Library

Main Car Park, Lyndhurst, SO43 6NY

Advance booking required

  • Call on: 023 8028 3444
Click To View Information on Forest Arts Centre

Old Milton Road, New Milton, BH25 6DS

Dance, drama and art classes for children and adults. Pick-up our brochure or see our website for details of our music, comedy and theatre performances

  • www.forest-arts.co.uk
  • Call on: 01425 612393

Sports & Leisure Facilities

Open All
Click To View Information on Brockenhurst College Sports Centre

Range of facilities suitable for both sporting and event hire including: floodlit all-weather sports pitches, extended Sports Hall with basketball, badminton, tennis, netball and volleyball courts, indoor cricket and football pitches, full equipped gym and fitness suite, 25 acres of playing fields, grass pitches for football, rugby and hockey and purpose-built changing facilities

  • sports@brock.ac.uk
  • www.brock.ac.uk

Angela 01590 625510

Multi-Use Games Area (MUGA) & Scout Hut

Brockenhurst Village Trust's work to provide the following new sport and community facilities at the vacant Highwood Road site is now complete:

  • A MUGA (Multi-Use Games Area): a sports court which can be used for a variety of different sports. This area is free to access and open to all - residents and visitors alike. It also has a small open air amenity and viewing area. For more information or to make a donation towards its ongoing maintenance and development please visit www.brockenhurstvillage.org.uk/muga
  • Scout Hut (please see Clubs & Societies section for contact details).
```
